title: IP not being updated.
body:
I dont know if this is a bug or a new client problem. But when i win games the total will update, but not work.

Say i got 100ip and went from 4700 to 4800, then try to buy a 4800 champ. It wouldnt work, i reset my client, the total changes back to 4700. I play another game and get 50ip. The total says 4850, i buy my champ reload my client and i am sitting at 0ip. Play another game get 100ip again total says 150 etc...

replies.body:
This is a fairly uncommon bug that crops up on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client (from login) to visit the store and cause a sync of your IP balance with the server again.

https://i.imgur.com/drrzBd9.png

Let me know if this worked.

I just played a few games, until i had enough. But what makes this a Beta client bug? and is it fixable?

EDIT:I also have a friend who gets it fairly recently so i dont think its THAT rare.

Thanks for the response

This is a beta client bug because it only happens on the Beta Client and because bugs aren't that uncommon in Beta software. It is fixable if you swap over the Legacy Client using the instructions in my first reply.

Hit me back if you still have issues with your IP balance after trying that fix.
